definition: any of numerous carnivorous or bloodsucking usually freshwater annelid worms (class Hirudinea) that have typically a flattened lanceolate segmented body with a sucker at each end
a hanger-on who seeks advantage or gain
examples: a celebrity surrounded by leeches who only want his money

definition: to attach oneself to a person as a leech
examples: … she would leech on to him and drain the life out of him.

definition: to bleed by the use of leeches
to drain the substance of : exhaust
examples: … bankers who had always leeched them white.

definition: either vertical edge of a square sail
the after edge of a fore-and-aft sail
